meanings.definition: A berry, especially one of the genus Vaccinium.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe bacca from the bush.
meanings.sent2: The forest was full of various types of baccas.
meanings.sent3: The playful squirrel juggled the baccas like tiny balls.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as the juiciest bacca.
meanings.sent5: The deep purple color of the bacca made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: A tobacco plant or its leaves.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the bacca for drying.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of bacca filled the air in the tobacco field.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the bacca leaves.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the bacca plant curled into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bacca leaves crumbled between his fingers.
